runs.comm: starts off with a length ball that moves across from outside leg, tucked away wide of fine leg
again pitching outside leg on a good length, worked straight to midwicket

Tanvir strikes in the first over, Mahela, looking to work a length ball to leg after taking a couple of steps out, has spooned it high up in the air off a leading edge instead, and Shoaib Malik manages to hold onto the steepler as he tumbles to the ground at cover, he had to shield his eyes initially from the floodlights as he steadied himself for the take
holds the bat well inside the line and lets this one angle across him
flicked off the pad to midwicket
bouncing across him from back of a length, he opens the face and guides it wide of point to third man
swings into the pads from a fullish length, he adjusts to work it past midwicket from middle and leg
opens the face and pushes a length ball going across him, to point
moves into the left-hander from back of a length, worked softly towards midwicket for one
too much with the angle into the right-hander, and down the leg side from a good length
ending on off stump and bouncing a tad, worked awkwardly in front of square leg
drives a pitched up ball neatly but straight to mid off
Sanga gets away, advances out, makes some room outside leg, and slashes this one hard in the air, but it bounces in front of Tanvir running across from squarish third man
well bowled, has him pushing at a good length ball which leaves him with the angle just outside off, and beats him, it bounced as well
slightly wider outside off, and Dilshan goes for the drive, beaten again

Tanvir is smiling, it was a rather poor line, fullish and down the leg side, but Dilshan has flicked it straight to fine leg, he saw the line and went after it powerfully, but picked the man in the deep
he is troubling the right-handers with the angle across them, this one pitches on a length around middle and off, draws him into an uncertain prod, and beats him with slight away movement
steady line on middle and leg, played out towards midwicket
he's run a length ball with the angle between second slip and gully, third man is around
steady back of a length ball outside off, steered to third man
loose from Sami, short, skiddy and wide outside off, Sanga goes hard at the cut, hits it in the air and picks up four to the left of third man
slightly fuller this time, but width given again, and accepted, this time scythed wide of point along the ground
Sami under pressure right away on comeback, still fuller but width again outside off, this time Sanga gets forward and goes for the drive, thumps it in the air past point
goes back of a length and into the body now, Sanga works it to midwicket
that could have been another boundary, but mid off scrambles to his left, dives and manages to stop the firm push from Sanga
pitched up around off and straightening a bit, Sanga gets forward to push it firmly, Afridi's dive is not enough at mid on
direct hit and Chandimal was gone, by miles, he was hesitant as he worked this one towards midwicket, then gathered pace late, but had no chance if the throw had hit
left alone outside off stump, Tanvir getting decent bounce
sends it down leg from back of a length, again getting good lift

Tanvir's productive night continues, now he has Sanga chopping a drive on to his stumps, Sanga walks back in disappointment, he went for a big cover drive, there was some width available off the pitched up ball, but all he managed was a big inside edge
left alone outside off
they have no clue about these tight deliveries going across, he is opened up by the angle, and pushes inside the line to be beaten

another direct hit, and Angelo was out comfortably, Chandimal pushing a length ball in front of extra cover, Angelo wanted the single, he was halfway up the pitch before he turned back, he was so far out that after the throw missed, the man backing up at mid on also had another go, but he too missed, Angelo was back by then though
worked off the pad through square leg
goes for a slog to a back of a length ball, manages to get it over mid on, it is stopped just inside the rope eventually
works to midwicket and holds up a hand immediately to the advancing Chandimal
that looked very close in real time, he was caught in the crease to one that nipped back in, no appeal from Pakistan, height? did not seem to be an inside edge
worked off the pad to deep square leg, there is an overthrow as well, the ball ricocheting off a direct hit
that angle again, reaches well forward and across and hangs his bat out at a length ball leaving him, pulls the bat away after he is beaten
slightly wider with the angle, and left alone this time
now he goes for a cut to a widish length ball outside off, not much pace on it off the pitch, beaten
a completely different angle now, comes  in from wide of the crease, slashed away past the lone slip to third man
coming in from back of a length now, quietly defended to the off side
pitched up ball around off pushed away
Sami strikes, Chandimal's heave misses, and Sri Lanka are in trouble now, Chandimal saw the length ball angled in, and decided to slog wildly over midwicket, but missed
that is a fine drive from Thirimanne first ball, bends the knee, opens the face and times the length ball through point
shortish one now, played out towards point
Sami is going for more runs, wide again, short too, Thirimanne slashes, and the thick edge flies over and past the lone slip
much better delivery, pitched up around the off stump, seemed to hold its line a tad, defended
tossed up generously outside off, pushed to extra cover
leading edge runs behind point now as he looks to work a flighted legbreak through midwicket
appeal for lbw but that struck him about a foot outside the line, he was looking to turn it behind square leg
looks to make room, but that turned in and he had to defend off the back foot
missed stumping, Afridi has hands on his head, Thirimanne walked out after playing over a yorker just outside off, but the debutant missed the take
pushes a full one to extra cover
defends a spinning offbreak off the front foot
turns in but going down the pads, worked to square leg
stays in the crease to a fullish one and punches it wide of extra cover
the straighter one from Hafeez, Angelo pushes inside the line, keeper cannot collect it again
now a big spinning offbreak, bounces too, he pushes forward and takes it on the body
punched down to long on from the crease
looks to drive a flighted ball outside off, mistimes the stroke to extra cover
they pinch a tight single in front of backward point who lobs the ball to the keeper as he dives forward, Thirimanne has made it though
fine shot, lofted over extra cover, seemed to be the wrong 'un, but he got forward and hit it very cleanly
worked with the spin to deep square
103 kph from Afridi as he rips it in on middle, Angelo manages to force it away to leg for one
down the track, gets a shade too close to the pitch, hits it down to long on
cuts a flat and skiddy one from off, straight to point
wants to push through extra cover, but this one drifts in, goes straight in with the angle, and produces an inside edge through midwicket
gets front leg forward and across and paddles it fine down leg
gets bat in front of pad to nudge it to leg but Hafeez gets to it quickly
starts off very wide outside off from around the stumps, slapped away to deep point
turning in at 93.9 kph on middle, punched to extra cover
gets down on a knee for a big sweep, but misses, not called a wide
cramped for room as it spins in quickly on middle and leg, punched to the bowler

it is not easy to hit Ajmal anytime, even harder to go after him under the pressure of T20, Angelo tries to slog with the turn, this one is bowled slightly slower, and strikes the stumps after going past Angelo's swipe
full ball swept neatly from outside off to fine leg
worked to square leg and could have been a run out, confusion whether to go for the run, both batsmen were out of the crease, got back to their respective ends in the end
worked in front of midwicket
appeal for lbw, the straighter delivery from around the stumps looked to be going down leg
cannot get it away, punched to the bowler
turned to fine leg off the pad
goes across and nudges with the spin to midwicket
length ball dropped behind point for one
tries to reverse sweep this one with the spin, but it goes under the bat-swing
width again, and Thirimanne connects this time, slices hard behind point
driven down to long on
swept with the spin down to fine leg
chipped in the air wide of long off
sweeps a flighted full toss from middle and gets it past short fine leg
fired in full on the pads, turned through square leg
that has been slog-swept in the air to the deep midwicket boundary, Thirimanne getting another one away, picking it up from middle
nudged behind square leg for one
spins in from outside off, and worked away in front of square leg

he's not collected cleanly, but now Ansar hits the stumps with an underarm lob, they were going for a sharp single after a soft push on the off side, batsman dived at the other end, the lower end of his bat was in the air, and he was consequently out of the crease marginally, as the bails came off
connects well with the reverse sweep but hits it straight to Gul at short third man, he takes a sharp catch as he tumbles to the ground, it was a quick doosra from Ajmal just outside off
pushed off the front foot to long off
leading edge almost carries to the bowler, bounces in front of him, it was a tossed up offbreak this time, he wanted to work it to leg
quicker one pushed back to the bowler
chops an attempted cut past the lone slip
back of a length ball guided past point from close to the body
turned to midwicket but it goes through Afridi's hands, he stands with hand on head and watches the ball roll to long on
he was getting forward, but Gul has him weaving out of the way of an accurate and sharp bouncer
shortish and into the body, he swings hard and gets it high and over short fine leg, it rolls into the rope
smack! that is in his zone, pitched up on the stumps, he gets forward, makes some room and thumps it high over long on
Gul goes for the yorker, not quite there, but full enough to prevent Perera from getting underneath it for a swing, rolls to the off side
down the track and pushed down the ground, fumble at long off allows them the second
that was close to being a run out, Perera was a touch late in plonking his bat down, seemed to have got his bat just in time as there was a direct hit
advanced out, gets into a tangle with the offbreak, but ends up getting a run as he drags the ball down the pitch with his body as he runs
tries to get underneath the full ball but it was in the blockhole and he can only hit it to long off
misses as he looks to sweep from outside off, a run to short third man
Perera gets one away, low full toss, he bashes it straight down the ground
swing and a miss outside off to the pitched up ball
slower one has been handled well, short just outside off, Kula pulls it through midwicket
punches a full toss straight past the bowler, long off manages to cut it off
Gul gets some bad bounce as keeper under-arms the ball along the ground to him, and they take the bye
bouncer now, Gul cannot collect the lob from the keeper yet again, and it is a wide for height as well, comfortably over the batsman
goes full, Perera likes it, he makes some room outside leg and lifts it over wide long on
slogs at a slower one outside off, it sails over square leg and they take two more
